decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly casting spells to trigger the Arclight Phoenix's ability and bring it back from the graveyard, attacking aggressively to deal damage to the opponent before they can stabilize. The deck includes a mix of low-cost spells and card draw to ensure a steady stream of spells to trigger the Phoenix's ability, while also including some control elements like Lightning Axe and Spell Pierce to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast, evasive threats and efficient removal spells.

The deck focuses on putting pressure on the opponent early in the game with a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan and creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Cecil, Dark Knight to apply pressure, the deck aims to control the board and finish off the opponent quickly. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Faerie Miscreant and Moon-Circuit Hacker provide card advantage and additional threats, while cards like Spell Pierce and Go for the Throat help deal with various threats the opponent may have.

The main focus of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with efficient creatures such as Bishop of Wings, Skyclave Apparition, and Resplendent Angel. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early game aggression from creatures like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves, while also utilizing cards like Collected Company to generate card advantage and further strengthen the board state. The inclusion of cards like Righteous Valkyrie and Kayla's Reconstruction helps to increase the deck's resilience and ability to come back from difficult situations.

The focus of this UW Control deck is to maintain control of the game through countermagic, board wipes, and card advantage. It utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi and Narset to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of Kaheera as a companion provides additional value and synergy with the deck's creatures. By utilizing a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and card draw, this deck aims to outlast the opponent and secure victory through attrition and strategic decision-making.

This deck focuses on creating a powerful combo with Greasefang and Parhelion II. It utilizes cards like Fleeting Spirit, Seasoned Hallowblade, and Monument to Endurance to generate tokens and protect key pieces. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Vanishing Verse to control the board. With the ability to quickly assemble its combo pieces and disrupt opponents, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and strategic maneuvers.

This deck revolves around the combo of Greasefang and Parhelion II to create a powerful board presence and overwhelm the opponent. It includes support cards like Fatal Push, Thoughtseize, and Vanishing Verse to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of Seasoned Hallowblade and Monument to Endurance also helps to protect key pieces of the combo. With a mix of removal, protection, and powerful combo pieces, this deck is designed to quickly establish dominance and outmaneuver your opponent in a Pioneer 1 vs 1 matchup.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressively attacking the opponent with efficient creatures and disruptive spells. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat while putting pressure on the opponent with powerful threats like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Bloodtithe Harvester. The deck also utilizes disruptive spells such as Thoughtseize and Duress to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy while disrupting their plays.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with quick and aggressive creatures, utilizing direct damage spells to control the board and finish off the opponent quickly. The deck focuses on dealing damage as fast as possible, using cards that benefit from dealing damage to the opponent or their creatures. The goal is to apply pressure early in the game and maintain it until victory, closing out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

The deck revolves around combining the abilities of Greasefang and Parhelion II to create a powerful synergy. The deck includes cards that support this combo, such as Fleeting Spirit and Seasoned Hallowblade, as well as control elements like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize to protect the combo pieces. The land base includes cards like Bleachbone Verge and Godless Shrine for mana fixing. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble the combo and overwhelm the opponent with its synergistic interactions.

This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost spells and creatures to quickly attack the opponent's life total. By efficiently drawing cards and pumping out damage, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The inclusion of powerful support cards like Treasure Cruise and Cori-Steel Cutter helps to maintain tempo and pressure on the opponent. The mana base is streamlined for consistency in casting spells and creatures. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and aggressive in securing victory.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on dealing quick and efficient damage to the opponent. It includes cards that allow for direct damage as well as creatures with powerful abilities to increase damage output. By utilizing a combination of burn spells and aggressive creatures, this deck aims to pressure the opponent early on and maintain board presence to close out the game quickly. The mana base is designed to support this aggressive strategy and ensure a smooth curve of threats throughout the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing cheap and efficient creatures with haste to deal damage to the opponent quickly. It also includes burn spells and enchantments to enhance the damage output of the creatures and provide additional reach. The goal is to apply constant pressure to the opponent, forcing them to stay on the defensive while the deck aims to finish the game before the opponent can stabilize. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy with a mix of Mountains and utility lands to maximize the deck's efficiency.

This deck focuses on using counterspells, removal, and card advantage to control the game and outvalue the opponent. It utilizes cards like Dovin's Veto and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria to control the board, while No More Lies and Floodfarm Verge provide card advantage. The deck also includes various win conditions like Elspeth, Storm Slayer and The Wandering Emperor to close out the game. Overall, the strategy revolves around staying ahead in card advantage and disrupting the opponent's game plan to secure victory.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive plays and disruption, utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Duress to disrupt the opponent's hand while deploying threats like Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to deal with opponent's creatures. The goal is to apply early pressure and maintain board control to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory. The deck's mana base includes cards like Mutavault and Blackcleave Cliffs to ensure consistency in casting spells.

The main concept of this Gruul Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient creatures and burn spells. By playing aggressive creatures like Soul-Scar Mage and Monastery Swiftspear along with burn spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and assert board control. The inclusion of Kumano, Faces Kakkazan and Monstrous Rage provides additional ways to push through damage and finish off the opponent. The deck also utilizes lands like Den of the Bugbear and Ramunap Ruins to maintain pressure even if the board stalls.

The deck focuses on using green ramp spells to quickly accelerate mana production in order to cast powerful control spells and creatures. It includes a mix of aggressive creatures like Soul-Scar Mage and Monastery Swiftspear, as well as removal spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage to control the board. The deck also utilizes cards like Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Heroes' Hangout to provide additional value and flexibility in different situations. By efficiently ramping up mana and controlling the game, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.
